abstract.text: Sets the visibility of the enclosing sheet presentation’s drag indicator.
Drag indicators are only supported on platforms that support sheet
resizing, and sheet resizing is generally only support on mobile.
Modifies size proposals to match the aspect ratio of the provided size.
Sets the style of the toggle.

composition lover re-implementing inheritance; I see it as innovation.
